title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 3 ยง 306.1 - Explanatory note regarding vacancies on the board of directors
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 3 ยง 306.1 - Explanatory note regarding vacancies on the board of directors

State Regulations
(a) Subdivision 1
paragraph (b) of section
7005
of the

Banking Law authorizes the superintendent to adopt a regulation which
establishes the circumstances under which vacancies on the board of directors
of a bank, trust company, stock-form savings bank, and stock-form savings and
loan association may be left unfilled until the next annual election by the
stockholders. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 3
ยง
306.1

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
